articles.content:

articles.title: Cheap Russian oil helps India widen petro product exports
articles.description: India has expanded its export markets for refined petro products in the past year, thanks to discounted Russian oil following the Ukraine war. The increase was significant in the cases of Argentina, Ecuador, Egypt, Iraq, Mauritius, Nigeria and Sudan
articles.content:
New Delhi: India has massively expanded export markets for its refined petro products in the last one year, commerce ministry data for April showed, thanks to discounted Russian oil that came gushing in the wake of the Ukraine war.
